navigation.mobileMenuDescription: Access navigation links, features, pricing, integrations, and support options

concerns.question: Can I delete reports?
concerns.answer: Yes. Reports can be deleted or archived anytime by authorized users.

concerns.question: Can I export the data in the format I want?
concerns.answer: Yes. You can export all responses and analytics in Excel, CSV, or PDF formats.

concerns.question: Can I do bulk downloads of my PDF reports?
concerns.answer: Yes. You can download multiple reports at once in just a few clicks.

concerns.question: Can I get training sessions to get started?
concerns.answer: Absolutely. We offer complimentary onboarding sessions so your team is fully confident using Pulse from Day 1.

concerns.question: Can I get training for my regional teams?
concerns.answer: Yes, as many as you need. We believe software is only successful when it's actually used. We provide free training for all your teams—regional, zone-level, or field.

concerns.question: Can I get refresher sessions for old or new users?
concerns.answer: Yes. We understand teams change, and users often need help with new features. We're happy to provide refresher sessions anytime—free of cost.

concerns.question: Can I email reports or summaries outside my organization?
concerns.answer: Yes, and there's no extra cost. You can email reports, summaries, or PDFs to vendors, partners, or any external email address.

concerns.question: Do you support very lengthy templates—like 500 questions?
concerns.answer: Yes. Many of our clients run templates with 500+ questions and attach 1,000+ photos. Pulse is built to handle real-world inspection complexity.

concerns.question: Are you constantly updating the product with new features and AI?
concerns.answer: Yes. Because we focus only on inspections, we're able to quickly adopt new technologies, including AI, and continuously improve the platform.

concerns.question: Will field users struggle or take more time than paper/Excel?
concerns.answer: No. We know field users often work in customer-facing or time-sensitive environments like hotels, warehouses, and hospitals. Pulse's mobile interface is ultra-simple and designed for fast use—even during hectic shifts.

concerns.question: Can I download reports of missed inspections to push my team?
concerns.answer: Yes. You can download and share missed inspection summaries with just one click—perfect for driving completion and accountability.

concerns.question: Can I download graphs from Analytics for my internal presentations?
concerns.answer: Yes. All charts and graphs are downloadable in image format (PNG) for quick use in your reports or presentations.

concerns.question: Do you support version control for templates?
concerns.answer: Yes. You can clone, edit, and maintain multiple versions of a template—old data remains intact.

concerns.question: If I delete questions from a template, will old data be lost?
concerns.answer: No. All past inspection responses are preserved in the system—even if the template is modified.

concerns.question: Can I create templates by uploading Excel files?
concerns.answer: Yes. You can upload checklists in Excel format and turn them into working templates in minutes.

concerns.question: Can I upload all my sites in one go?
concerns.answer: Yes. Upload all locations in bulk using a simple Excel upload—no need to enter them one by one.

concerns.question: Can I bulk edit or delete users, sites, or reports?
concerns.answer: Yes. We offer bulk editing and bulk deletion tools for all major data elements.

concerns.question: Can I add people in CC when sharing reports?
concerns.answer: Yes. You can automatically add stakeholders in CC to distribute reports to multiple recipients.

items.question: What happens if I cancel my plan?
items.answer: If you're paying monthly, then your payments will stop on the next monthly payment. Annual subscriptions are only refundable for the unused portion of the year in special circumstances.

items.question: Can some of my users be on a free plan and some on a premium plan?
items.answer: No, you all need to be on the same plan so that you have access to the same information. By upgrading your account to Pro you unlock all of the Pulse feature set, to all of your team members.

items.question: Who pays for our account?
items.answer: One person in your Pulse team (or organization), called the administrator, pays for all users on the account under a single monthly or annual billing statement.

items.question: Is there a limit to the number of users I can have under my organization?
items.answer: No, there is no limit to the number of users you can add under your organization. Our single plan includes unlimited users at no additional cost per user.

items.question: Can I trial the plan before I pay?
items.answer: Yes! You can enjoy a 14-day free trial of our plan without any obligation. There is no need to provide your credit card details upfront—just sign up and start using it.

items.question: During my trial, is there a limit to the number of users I can add to my account?
items.answer: No, you can set up as many users as you like during your trial and you will not be charged during the 14 days period.

items.question: Are we able to set up invoicing payment?
items.answer: Yes, invoicing is available for organizations on our annual Pro or Enterprise plans with more than 50 users.

items.question: What integrations are available?
items.answer: The sky's the limit with integrations. We have hundreds of options to choose from depending on your personal needs.

items.question: What happens to my bill if I increase or decrease users between billing cycles?
items.answer: If you increase users: You will be charged an adjusted prorated amount for the new number of users for the rest of the remainder of the current billing period.

testimonials.title: Don't just take our word for it

support.title: We're Here to Support You
support.description: Don't hesitate to reach out with any questions, whether you're interested in learning more before making a purchase, you're an existing customer needing assistance, or you have other inquiries. Contact us, and we promise to respond within an hour. No question is too small; we're here to help!

items.name: Arpita Aditi
items.title: Founder of Dil Foods
items.quote: We absolutely love using Pulse, as it has revolutionized our ability to monitor the health of each of our outlets remotely. The intuitive interface ensures that team members at all levels can seamlessly navigate and complete audits with ease. One of the standout features is the simplicity and flexibility in creating and customizing templates. It's so user-friendly that it hardly feels like using outsourced software. Kudos to the team for achieving Product-Market Fit (PMF)!

items.name: Jaydeep Barman
items.title: Founder of Rebel Foods
items.quote: At Rebel Foods, we prioritize food safety and customer experience. Pulse helps manage over 4,000 internet restaurants across 450 kitchens in 4 countries, ensuring compliance through self-reporting and QA checks. The Pulse app streamlines data collection with time-stamped, geo-tagged images and instant reports, ensuring transparency, accountability, and operational excellence.

items.name: Rashmi Daga
items.title: Founder of FreshMenu
items.quote: At FreshMenu, we are always eager to adopt new intuitive technology to deliver high-quality food within the hygiene protocols to our consumers. Thus, we collaborated with Pulse. It is an easy-to-use tool that provides high visibility in the form of insightful data and visual proofs accessible in real-time from anywhere. It has helped us in resolving issues faster and creating an overall safety culture.

items.name: Dr. Shikha Lakhanpal
items.title: Co-Founder of Living Food
items.quote: Pulse has been a game-changer for us. The app's intuitive interface and robust features make data collection and reporting seamless. We are able to track actions, reporting in real-time and it has made remote management very easy for us. Kudos to Pulse team for providing a great experience. An indispensable tool for any organization looking to enhance their operational excellence and ensure compliance. Highly recommended!
